sentences.sContent: He volleyed the ball spectacularly into the far corner of the net.
sentences.sCn: 他一个精彩的凌空抽射，将球踢进了球网的远角。

synos.tran: [军]齐射；齐射出的子弹；凌空状态

trans.tranCn: 齐发， 群射； 截击
trans.tranOther: to hit or kick a ball before it touches the ground, especially in tennis or football
a large number of bullets, rocks etc shot or thrown through the air at the same time
